/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Billboards and signs adorn the sides of the road, hinting at the commercial vibrancy of the area. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere amidst the city's hustle and bustle.
